content: पटलं [पट् वेष्टने कलच्] {@--1@} A roof, thatch; विनमितपटलांतं दृश्यते जीर्णकुड्यं <ls>Mu. 3. 15.</ls> {@--2@} A cover, covering, veil, coating (in general); शिरसि मसीपटलं दधाति दीपः <ls>Bv. 1. 74.</ls> {@--3@} A film or coating over the eyes. {@--4@} A heap, multitude, mass, quantity; रथांगपाणेः पटलेन रोचिषां <ls>Śi. 1. 21</ls>; जलदपटलानि <ls>Pt. 1. 361</ls>; क्षौद्रपटलैः <ls>R. 4. 63</ls>; मुक्तापटलं <ls n="R.">13. 17</ls>; तारकपटल <ls>Gīt. 7.</ls> {@--5@} A basket. {@--6@} Retinue, train. {@--7@} A mark on the forehead or any other part of the body. --लः, --ली {@--1@} A tree. {@--2@} A stalk. --लः, --लं A section or chapter of a book.
